body_html:
No support publicly and Apple is being typically opaque about what their partnership with google + metal really refers to, and when it will see the light of day. In other words best to figure something else out. http://vade.info

body:
No support publicly and Apple is being typically opaque about what their partnership with google + metal really refers to, and when it will see the light of day. 

In other words best to figure something else out. 

   
   

 http://vade.info

> On Sep 22, 2018, at 11:37 AM, vashat <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Not sure I understand, is there support for metal accelerated tensorflow right now? If yes, is there any documentation/resource on how to access it? Is the latest version of tensorflow metal accelerated?
